name: Droppy Ballz Falling Down
description:
This is simple, sleek design, fast-paced and addictive red game. Droppy balls are falling from sky, Swipe left/right to catch 'em on same color tiles and earn points. Be careful not to catch the droppy balls on different color tile. Just focus on your screen to beat the speed on falling . some special balls will switch your whole base to single color bars. so try to catch those switch color .

If you want to enjoy in spare time then you are on right place. Download Droppy Ballz game now. The only way to survive in this game is to catch as many balls as u can and switch the tiles really fast.

Go break your own records and tell your friends about it and race with them in high score.be leader of Leadership Board! Keep trying to be better and beat your own times! Tell Your friends to beat you Best!

Droppy Ballz features a fun color-matching game designed for users of all ages! It is an addictive color matching game with simple and fresh graphics! It is a game that you can play with just one hand, while having lots of fun! And can you believe it, the droppy ballz! also tests your reaction time and reflexes!


** How to play **

- Swipe right or left to move the bottom color while the ball drops
- Your goal is to match the color of the ball with that of Bottom color match balls


** Feature **

- A successful color matching earns you one point
- A failed color matching ends the game
- It helps to you to distinguish between different colors.
- Based on visual perception and intuitive perception of colors ball game.
- Develop motor skills.
- For Beginners: with a constant velocity of the falling color ball.
- For Normal: with an accelerating rate of the falling ball match balls.
- For Expert: with variable speed and a few balls of different colors 4-games.
- Contain Red ball game, green ball, blue ball, yellow ball, orange balls 4 games.
